changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS product ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, sku VARCHAR(255), name VARCHAR(255), description VARCHAR(255), unit_price NUMERIC(13,2), image_url VARCHAR(255), active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, units_in_stock INT, date_created TIMESTAMP(6), last_updated TIMESTAMP(6), category_id BIGINT NOT NULL, brand VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, short_description VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_category FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES product_category (id) );
